articles.title: Comparative genomics reveals the dynamics of chromosome evolution in Lepidoptera - Nature.com
articles.description: Analysis of 210 lepidopteran chromosome-level genomes reveals stability of the 32 ancestral chromosomes and extensive reorganization, including fusion and fission events, in eight lineages over 250 million years of evolution.
